snippet.title: SOS: Forgotten Planet trailer. Educational horror game that teaches Morse Code
snippet.description:
Trailer for my upcoming game SOS: Forgotten planet. It’s an educational horror game that teaches Morse Code.

Wishlist on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2891650/SOS_Forgotten_Planet/

Join the Community on discord: 
discord.gg/dWv3MEfEHc

I stream development on twitch: 
twitch.tv/riskybiscuitgames

Music by: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

#indiegame 
#horrorgaming 
#morsecode 
#gamedev #gametrailers
